ProteinName	tRNA (cytosine(38)-C(5))-methyltransferase (EC 2.1.1.204) (DNA (cytosine-5)-methyltransferase-like protein 2) (Dnmt2) (DNA methyltransferase homolog HsaIIP) (DNA MTase homolog HsaIIP) (M.HsaIIP) (PuMet)
GeneName	TRDMT1 DNMT2
Length	367
Function	Specifically methylates cytosine 38 in the anticodon loop of tRNA(Asp) (PubMed:16424344). Has higher activity on tRNA(Asp) modified with queuosine at position 34 (PubMed:30093495).
